PW.title: Paranoid World
PW.Dialog.Bond1: Choose the bonus for the bond on this
PW.Dialog.AskMod1: Enter a custom modifier for this
PW.MoveGroupHelp: Multiple moves with the same move-group will be either/or selections when creating a new character using the character builder.
PW.Common.Name: Name
PW.TagsHelp: (Use tab to autocomplete, commas to create new tags, and double click a tag to edit it)
PW.ClassBaseLoadHelp: VIO will automatically be added to this number.
PW.ClassEquipmentGroupHelp: You can define groups of equipment choices for this class below. Each group can have any number of equipment items dropped inside of it, and it can have its choice mode set to either choose one of the items or choose all.
PW.ClassEquipmentGroupPlaceholder: Choose one, all are are weight 0 for you
PW.ChooseAbilityScoresIncrease: Choose an ability score to increase by 1.
PW.ChooseStartingOne: Choose one of these to start with:
PW.ChooseStartingAll: You also start with all of these:
PW.ChooseAdvanced2: When you gain a level from 2-5, choose from these moves.
PW.ChooseAdvanced6: When you gain a level from 6-10, choose from these moves or the level 2-5 moves.
PW.DefaultLook:
Choose one from each:
  • Hair: clean, well-groomed
  • Jumpsuit: hand-ironed, Press-O-Matic™ setting 1, Press-O-Matic™ setting 2
  • Boot Laces: criss-cross, over-under, straight bar, quick tight, sawtooth, lattice, double helix, double back, loop back, FeltGrip™ straps
  • ID attachment: lanyard, retractable belt clip
PW.troubleshooter.Bond1: _______________ is a model citizen worth imitating.
PW.troubleshooter.Bond2: _______________ has a treasonous secret I must uncover!
PW.troubleshooter.Bond3: I should take _______________ down a peg.
PW.Settings.itemIcons.name: Enable Item Icons
PW.Settings.itemIcons.hint: Enable visual icons for moves and equipment in character sheets (requires browser reload).
PW.Settings.nightmode.name: Enable Nightmode
PW.Settings.nightmode.hint: Enable night/dark mode for character sheets (per user).
PW.Settings.xpFormula.name: XP Formula
PW.Settings.xpFormula.hint: Enter the XP formula used for leveling up. Available attributes are those that would work in rolls sent to chat, such as (2 * @attributes.level.value) + 10. Default is (@attributes.level.value + 7)
PW.Settings.advForward.name: Clear ADV/DIS After Rolls
PW.Settings.advForward.hint: If enabled, advantage and disadvantage choices on the character sheet will be reset to normal after each roll (similar to Forward).
PW.Settings.driveSingle.name: Override "Drive" label (single).
PW.Settings.driveSingle.hint: Override "Drive", such as by using "Objective" instead.
PW.Settings.drivePlural.name: Override "Drives" label (plural).
PW.Settings.drivePlural.hint: Override "Drives", such as by using "Objectives" instead.
PW.Settings.bondSingle.name: Override "Bond" label (single).
PW.Settings.bondSingle.hint: Override "Bond", such as by using "Flag" instead.
PW.Settings.bondPlural.name: Override "Bonds" label (plural).
PW.Settings.bondPlural.hint: Override "Bonds", such as by using "Flags" instead.
PW.Dialog.askContent: Choose a stat for this {name} move.
PW.Dialog.bondContent: Enter a bonus for the bond or modifier for this {name} move.
PW.Dialog.askmodContent: Enter a dice roll modifier for this {name} move.
PW.Notifications.noClassWarning: You must choose a valid class before you can level up.
